Table.Name: Service - Managed Users
Table.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT contacts.contactid, CONCAT(contacts.lastname, ', ', contacts.firstname) AS 'Contact Name', locations.name AS 'Location Name', clients.name AS 'Client Name', contacts.contactflags as `ContactFlags (contacts)` FROM contacts LEFT JOIN locations ON locations.locationid = contacts.locationid LEFT JOIN clients ON clients.clientid = contacts.clientid WHERE (((contacts.ContactFlags & 3) = 3)) GROUP BY contacts.contactId ORDER BY contacts.lastName
